```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(broom)
library(rsq)

colSpec <- cols(SampleID = col_character(), 
                familyNr = col_character(), 
                batch = col_character(),
                no.DNMs = col_integer())
samples_c1 <- read_delim(file = here("dnmvar-compendium/data/samples_c1.tsv"), delim = "\t", col_types = colSpec)
samples_c2 <- read_delim(file = here("dnmvar-compendium/data/samples_c2.tsv"), delim = "\t", col_types = colSpec)
samples_c3 <- read_delim(file = here("dnmvar-compendium/data/samples_c3.tsv"), delim = "\t", col_types = colSpec)
samples_c4 <- read_delim(file = here("dnmvar-compendium/data/samples_c4.tsv"), delim = "\t", col_types = colSpec)
samples_c5 <- read_delim(file = here("dnmvar-compendium/data/samples_c5.tsv"), delim = "\t", col_types = colSpec)

cohorts <- 
  list(
    samples_c1,
    samples_c2,
    samples_c3,
    samples_c4,
    samples_c5
  )

```


Number of multi-offspring families & mean number of mutations per offspring

```{r}
familyStats <- function(autism1, tblHdr = "no.DNMs") {
  no.offspring <- sum(autism1[, tblHdr]>0)
  no.familys <- autism1 %>% group_by(familyNr) %>% summarize(no.children = length(SampleID)) %>% filter(no.children>1) %>% nrow()
  no.muts <- sum(autism1[, tblHdr])
  tibble(no.familys=no.familys, no.muts.pp=no.muts/no.offspring)
}

sapply(cohorts,
       familyStats)

```


Parameters of linear age model

```{r}
linModParms <- 
  function(samples_c1) {
    simpMod <- lm(no.DNMs ~ fathersAgeAtConceptionInYears + mothersAgeAtConceptionInYears, samples_c1)
    adj.r.squared <- simpMod %>% glance() %>% pull(adj.r.squared)
    coefs <- simpMod %>% coef()
    return(cbind(t(coefs), adj.r.squared))
  }

lapply(cohorts, 
       linModParms)

```


Parameters of Poisson age model

```{r}
poisModParms <- 
  function(samples_c1) {
    poisMod <- glm(no.DNMs ~ fathersAgeAtConceptionInYears + mothersAgeAtConceptionInYears, 
                   samples_c1, 
                   family = poisson)
    adj.r.squared <- poisMod %>% rsq()
    coefs <- poisMod %>% coef()
    return(cbind(t(coefs), adj.r.squared))
  }

lapply(cohorts, 
       poisModParms)


mdls <- 
  foreach(ageMdlFrame = ageMdlFrameList) %do% {
    glm(no.DNMs ~ fathersAgeAtConceptionInYears + mothersAgeAtConceptionInYears, 
            data=ageMdlFrame, 
            family = poisson)
  }

```
